ygData.subject: Re: Hope this isn't too OT..but
ygData.msgSnippet: The Kunark expansion supposedly has better 3d and 3d support.  Since the Riva chipsets are the market leader, let s hope Verant decides to support them. ...
ygData.messageBody:
The Kunark expansion supposedly has better 3d and 3d support. Since the
Riva chipsets are the market leader, let's hope Verant decides to support them.


At 03:56 PM 2/24/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>
>
>Yeah EQ doesn't support the NVIDIA chip sets like 3DFX . . .
>
>I was sadly dissapointed when my brand spanking new GeForce256 looked
>worse than my VOODOO2
>
>I emailed <mailto:support@...>support@... and I will
>let you know what turns up.
>
>now outside of EQ the cards rocks! I mean I did this 3D benchmark and it
>was about 3 times faster than my VOODOO2 .. . really smokin'
>
>I changed my CPU speeds and FSB too and there was a noteable increase in
>performance of the video card when the CPU overall Mhz and FSB was
>increased so if you have a newer system I'd get one. I think EQ will
>support it soon. </e crosses his fingers>
>
>
>>----- Original Message -----
>>From: <mailto:trizzen@...>Trizzen Do'Trevan
>>To: <mailto:EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 10:25 AM
>>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hope this isn't too OT..but
>>
>>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <<mailto:trizzen@...>trizzen@...>
>>
>>really? From the previous threads, I was going to go
>>online and buy one since I still use a banshee
>>card....now this is making me do a double take.
>>
>>Anymore input? Please?!?!
>>
>>
>>
